text:
Water Related Disasters (Floods & Drought)

> Along with this, four thematic papers on key areas are as follows:

° Temperature related disasters: Heat and Cold Wave - Implications for
Health Adaptation and Resilience.

° Water related disasters: Floods and Drought - Implications for Health
Adaptation and Resilience.

° Air Pollution and Health: Special Focus on Air Quality Emergencies.

° Disaster Waste Management and Health Risk Reduction.

Yr
